# The `MachineFunctionAnalysis` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

## Description {#details}

This analysis create <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinefunction">MachineFunction</a> for given <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/function">Function</a>.

To release the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinefunction">MachineFunction</a>, users should invalidate it explicitly.

Definition at line 25 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/machinefunctionanalysis-h">MachineFunctionAnalysis.h</a>.
